title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager, the following error message is displayed: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.
OB: The JAR packager reports a failure to create the JAR with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5' when attempting to package a file.
EB: The JAR packager should allow the packaging of files even if there are unsaved changes in the editor.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a file in the editor and make changes without saving them. 2. Open the JAR packager for the project containing the file. 3. Enter all the required information such as path, destination, and name for the JAR packager. 4. Click on the 'Finish' button.
